dataflowSinks.name: UserQuerystoragepowerquery
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['output01.txt'],
	mapColumn(
		ORDER_LINE_ID,
		ORDER_ID,
		CUSTOMER_KEY,
		PRODUCT_KEY,
		QUANTITY,
		ORDER_DATE,
		NET_AMOUNT,
		TAX_MONEY,
		TOTAL_AMOUNT,
		ROW_INSERTED_DATE,
		ROW_INSERTED_BY,
		PRICE,
		PRODUCT_PRICE
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UserQuerystoragepowerquery
